1402070.name: SOK PRO Demo
1402070.description:
SOK PRO Demo is a sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off. Completely redesigned from scratch, recreated on a new engine and with new functions.

Features:
✔️ Undo of a move in case of error;
✔️ Switch between full screen and windowed mode;
✔️ Convenient and quick selection of the required level;
✔️ Ability to change the language and other settings;
✔️ Screenshots are working correctly;
✔️ New background music (can be turned off);
✔️ Selectable background color:
▪ Dark theme;
▪ Classic, light theme;
▪ Gold, Lime and Diamond backgrounds.


And also everything that was in the classic SOK:
■ Complete remaster of all 10 different levels;
■ Community Hub Walkthrough Guides.
